    R6 class for input-output matrix

    iom.Rd

    R6 class for input-output matrix.

    Public fields

    id

    Identifier of the new instance

    intermediate_transactions

    Intermediate transactions matrix.

    total_production

    Total production matrix.

    final_demand

    Final demand matrix.

    exports

    Exports matrix.

    imports

    Imports matrix.

    taxes

    Taxes matrix.

    wages

    Wages matrix.

    operating_income

    Operating income matrix.

    added_value_final_demand

    Value added final demand matrix.

    added_value

    Value added matrix.

    occupation

    Occupation vector

    technical_coefficients_matrix

    Technical coefficients matrix.

    leontief_inverse_matrix

    Leontief inverse matrix.

    Methods

    Public methods

    • iom$new()

    • iom$add()

    • iom$remove()

    • iom$tec_coeff()

    • iom$leontief_inverse()

    • iom$clone()

    Method new()

    Creates a new instance of this R6 class.

    Usage

    iom$new(
  id,
  intermediate_transactions,
  total_production,
  final_demand = NULL,
  exports = NULL,
  imports = NULL,
  taxes = NULL,
  wages = NULL,
  operating_income = NULL,
  added_value_final_demand = NULL,
  added_value = NULL,
  occupation = NULL,
  technical_coefficients_matrix = NULL,
  leontief_inverse_matrix = NULL
)

    Arguments

    id

    Identifier for the input-output matrix.

    intermediate_transactions

    Intermediate transactions matrix.

    total_production

    Total production matrix.

    final_demand

    Final demand matrix.

    exports

    Exports matrix.

    imports

    Imports matrix.

    taxes

    Taxes matrix.

    wages

    Wages matrix.

    operating_income

    Operating income matrix.

    added_value_final_demand

    Value added final demand matrix.

    added_value

    Value added matrix.

    occupation

    Occupation matrix.

    technical_coefficients_matrix

    Technical coefficients matrix.

    leontief_inverse_matrix

    Leontief inverse matrix.

    Method add()

    Adds a matrix to a previously imported IO matrix.

    Usage

    iom$add(matrix_name, matrix)

    Arguments

    matrix_name

    One of final_demand, exports, imports, added_value_final_demand, added_value or occupation matrix to be added.

    matrix

    Matrix object to be added.

    Method remove()

    Removes a matrix from a previously imported IO matrix.

    Usage

    iom$remove(matrix_name)

    Arguments

    matrix_name

    One of final_demand, exports, imports, added_value_final_demand, added_value or occupation matrix to be removed.

    matrix

    Matrix object to be removed.

    Method tec_coeff()

    Calculate the technical coefficients matrix.

    Usage

    iom$tec_coeff()

    Method leontief_inverse()

    Calculate the Leontief inverse matrix.

    Usage

    iom$leontief_inverse(technical_coefficients_matrix)

    Arguments

    technical_coefficients_matrix

    Technical coefficients matrix.

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    iom$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
